feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Strange, that I, who have handled so many deadly lances, strange, that I should shake so now.

causedBy.name: Seeing the muskets in the rack

feels.name: Evil Thought
feels.quote: out of Starbuck’s heart, at that instant when he saw the muskets, there strangely evolved an evil thought

causedBy.name: Seeing the muskets in the rack

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Loaded? I must see. Aye, aye; and powder in the pan;—that’s not good. Best spill it?—wait. I’ll cure myself of this.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: I can’t withstand thee, then, old man. Not reasoning; not remonstrance; not entreaty wilt thou hearken to; all this thou scornest.

Places.name: Cabin
Places.description: Isolated subterraneousness, humming silence, loaded muskets in the rack, cabin lamp burning fitfully.

Objects.name: Musket
Objects.description: The musket that Starbuck pointed at him.
